name: TowerOffense
description:
Tower Offense

Navigate through the darkness and place turrets to protect the ship (and the tower)! Play in a dark room with headphones for the best experience!

Controls

Click on the Turret icon to select the building tool, then anywhere on the grid to place your turret. Make sure you have enough money to buy the turrets. (The wall icon is currently not interactable.)

Turrets will destroy themselves after a certain amounts of shots fired.

When in doubt, follow the instructions on the lower right info panel!

Hint if you're struggling: light up the whole playing field by spreading the turrets out evenly for an easier experience!

A PS1-graphic inspired tower defense game by two game design students

Credits

A game by Sebastien Decuyper and Marie Wispler

This game was created for the Game Design // UE course at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences. 

 Supervised by: Prof. Berger

"Remote Controlled Games"  (Winter Semester 2021)
